titleStmt.title: SII 6.340: original edition by K. V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 340. (A.R. No. 57 of 1898). ON THE EAST AND NORTH WALLS OF THE KOLAMBESVARA TEMPLE IN THE SAME VILLAGE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . pūmevi vaḷara tirupapoṉ mārvu puṇara ṉāmevu kalaimakaḷ nalamperitu ciṟappa vicaiyamāmakaḷ velpuyat tiruppa Icaiyuñ celviyum Eṇṭicai viḷaṅka nirupar vantiṟaiñca niṇilamaṭantaiyait tirumaṇam puṇarntu cirvaḷar tarumam Aṇimuṭi kavitteṉa maṇimuṭi cūṭi mallaiñālattup palluyiṟ
k kellām Ellaiyi liṉpam Iyalvuṭa neyta veṇkuṭai niḻaṟṟac ceṅko locci vāḻi palluḻi Āḻi naṭappac cempon virasiṅ·ṅāsaṉattup puvaṉamuḻutuṭaiyāḷoṭum viṟṟiruntaruḷiya kovirācakecaripanmarāṉa tiripuvaṉaccakkaravattikaḷ śrīkulottuṅkacoḻadevaṟku yāṇṭu 9 Āvatu jayaṅkoṇṭa
coḻamaṇṭalattu kāliyūrkkoṭṭattu taṉiyūr śrīrājentiracoḻacatuppetimaṅkalattu Āḷuṭaiyār tirukkuḻampapāṭiUṭaiya māhātevaṟku coḻamaṇṭalattu poyakaināṭṭu kaṇṭarātittaṉi lirukkum maṉṟāṭi periyāṉ tillaināyakakkoṉ Ittevaṟku vaitta tirununtāviḷakku Oṉṟukku Aṉṟāṭu naṟkācu pati
ṉmuṉṟuṅ kaikkoṇṭu veḷḷai mutti kaṭṭaḷaiyil śrīmatirāntakavatiyiṉ teṟku tiruvekampavatiyiṉ meṟku Oṉpatāṅ kaṇṇāṟṟu 2 catukkattu vaṭameṟkaṭaiyap pāṭakam Araiyum muṉṟāñ catukkattu vaṭakkaṭaiya pāṭakam Iraṇṭum Āka pāṭakam Iraṇṭaraiyum vaṟṟalūr tiruttaṇiyapaṭṭaṉpāṭu koṇṭa pāṭakam Ira
ṇṭaraikkum Aṉṟāṭu naṟkācu patiṉoṉṟum Āvaṇakkaḷiye kiḻikaiccilavaṟak koṇṭu viṟṟu vilaiyāvaṇañ ceytu kuṭutteṉ meṟcollappaṭṭa Ātitāsaṉ taṇṭecuratevaṟku vaṟṟalūr tiruttaṇiyapaṭṭaṉ kuṭutta pāṭakam Iraṇṭaraiyuṅ kaikkoṇṭu Ikkoyilkāṇiyuṭaiya kaucikaṉ vā
ḻavantāṉpaṭṭaṉum kauvicikaṉ nāṟpatteṇṇāyirapaṭṭaṉum Ikkācu patiṉmūṉṟuṅ kaikkoṇṭu cantirātittavarai Ittiruviḷakku celuttakkaṭavomākavum Ittirununtāviḷakkupaṭṭiyāl vanta pāṭakam Iraṇṭaraikkum nāṅkaḷe Antarāyam Iṟuttu Ittirununtāviḷak
ku celuttakkaṭavomāka kaikkoṇṭom
Eṅkaḷukkup piṉpum kucciyum Alakum Eṭut
tu Ikkoyilil pukuntu kāṇiceyavāre It
tirununtāviḷakku Erikkakkaṭavomāka cammatit
tom Itupaṉmāyecura rakṣai .
Digital edition of SII 6.340 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
